name: Promedia Directories Pte Ltd.
overview:
The Green Book Revolutionized the Information Services industry by introducing the idea of using specific and comprehensive categories of different products and services, thus making it easier for users to find what they want faster and easier. The Company was established in the year 1980 by its present CEO, Mr. Francis Teo and his American partner, Mr. Ralph Victor Showalter.

Since its inception, The Green Book has been continually providing the most specific and comprehensive information for directory users. In the year 2000, the ITG bought 60% of the Green Book thus allowing the company to enjoy the benefits of having a strong corporate partner.

The Green Book remains to be one of the respected media in its field and considered as the strongest directory in the Singapore market today. The Green Book’s audited circulation and attention to publication quality makes it the ideal vehicle for advertising various Industrial, Commercial, and Consumer products and services.

Users from businesses, CEO, managers, purchasers & engineers up to the consumer market depend on The Green Book as #1 sourcing guide for finding anything they want faster.

offices.address1: 41 Jalan Pemimpin #03-01, Kong Beng Industrial Building
